==Japanese==

===Kanji===
{{ja-kanji|grade=3|rs=欠02}}

====Readings====
{{ja-readings
|goon=[[し]] (shi)
|kanon=[[し]] (shi)
|kanyoon=[[じ]] (ji)
|kun=[[つぐ|つ.ぐ]] (tsu.gu), [[つぎ]] (tsugi), [[ついで]] (tsuide), [[すく|す.く]] (su.ku), [[すき]] (suki),
|nanori=[[き]] (ki), [[すき]] (suki), [[つぐ]] (tsugu), [[よし]] (yoshi)
}}

====Compounds====
* {{ja-r|目次|もくじ}}

===Etymology 1===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|し}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=し}} {{m|zh|次|tr=tshij<sup>H</sup>||in order; second}}.

Less common reading in modern Japanese. [[supersede|Superseded]] in most cases by ''ji''; see below.

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=on|し}}

====Affix====
{{ja-pos|affix|し}}

# [[next]], [[secondary]]
# [[following]]

=====Usage notes=====
Only found in compounds.

=====Derived terms=====
{{der-top}}
* {{ja-r|次第|しだい}}: [[order]], order of [[event]]s, [[circumstances]]; [[dependent]] upon, coming after, taking orders from
* {{ja-r|次忠|しちゅう}}: [[secondary]] [[loyalty]]
{{der-bottom}}

===Etymology 2===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=o|じ}}
{{IPAchar|/si/}} → {{IPAchar|/ʑi/}} → {{IPAchar|/d͡ʑi/}}

Sound shift from ''shi'' above.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanyo|じ}}

====Counter====
{{ja-pos|counter|じ}}

# number of times: an [[ordinal]] marker
#: {{ja-usex|第四'''次'''計画|だいよん'''じ''' けいかく|the four'''th''' plan}}
# number in a sequence, number of [[aspect]]s or [[dimension]]s
#: {{ja-usex|二'''次'''方程式、三'''次'''式|に'''じ''' ほうていしき、 さん'''じ''' しき|a quadrat'''ic''' equation, a thi'''rd order''' expression}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|じ}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=じ|rare}} [[order]], [[sequence]]

=====Usage notes=====
Seldom found in isolation.

====Prefix====
{{ja-pos|prefix|じ}}

# {{qualifier|attached to nouns}} the [[next]], [[secondary]], [[vice-]]
#: {{ja-usex|'''次'''位、'''次'''長|'''じ'''い、 '''じ'''ちょう|'''second''' rank, '''vice-'''director}}
# {{lb|ja|sort=じ|chemistry}} [[hypo-]] {{qualifier|used to distinguish the oxidation levels of various acids}}
#: {{ja-usex|亜塩素酸、'''次'''亜塩素酸、亜臭素酸、'''次'''亜臭素酸|あえんそ さん、 '''じ'''あえんそ さん、 あしゅうそ さん、 '''じ'''あしゅうそ さん|chlorous acid, '''hypo'''chlorous acid, bromous acid, '''hypo'''bromous acid}}

===Etymology 3===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|つぎ}}
Nominalization of the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=つぎ}}-derived verb {{m|ja|次ぐ|tr=tsugu||to be in a sequence; to follow, to continue from something, to be next; to connect, to join}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|つぎ|acc=2|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|つぎ}}

# [[next]], [[order]], [[sequence]], [[below]]
#* From the [http://www.catch.jp/wiki/index.php?tutorial_1 Emacs tutorial] ([http://cmgm.stanford.edu/classes/unix/emacs.html English])
#: {{ja-usex|では&#32;<tt>C-v</tt>&#32;（'''次'''の画面を見る）をタイプして'''次'''の画面に進んで下さい。（さあ、やってみましょう。コントロールキーを押しながら&#32;<tt>v</tt>&#32;です）|^で は&#32;<tt>C-v</tt>&#32;（'''つぎ''' の がめん を みる）を タイプ して '''つぎ''' の がめん に すすんで ください。（^さあ、やってみましょう。^コントロールキー を おしながら&#32;<tt>v</tt>&#32;です）|Now type <tt>C-v</tt> (View '''next''' screen) to move to the '''next''' screen. (go ahead, do it by depressing the control key and <tt>v</tt> together)}}

===Etymology 4===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|すき}}
Nominalization of the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=すく}}-derived verb {{m|ja|次く|tr=suku||to follow, to continue from something, to be next;}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

The verb form was obsolete even in olden times. Existence of the verb, possibly related to [[次ぐ|''tsugu'']] mentioned above, is inferred from placenames found in the [[w:Man'yōshū|''Man'yōshū'']] and other ancient poetry.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|すき}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|主基}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|すき}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=すき|Shinto}} at the {{m|ja|大嘗祭|tr=Daijōsai}} and other major Shintō ceremonies, refers to the group of regional representatives making [[offering]]s of [[sake]] and [[grain]], who do so after the initial offering

===Etymology 5===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=k|ついで}}
{{IPAchar|/tugite/}} → {{IPAchar|/tuide/}}

Sound shift from {{m|ja|次第|tr=tsugite||order, sequence}}, itself originally the {{m|ja|連用形|tr=ren'yōkei||continuative or stem form}} of now-obsolete {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=ついで}}-derived verb {{m|ja|継ぎつ|tr=tsugitsu||to do things in sequence, to establish an order}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref>

====Pronunciation====
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|ついで|acc=0|acc_ref=DJR}}

====Alternative forms====
* {{ja-l|序}}, {{ja-l|序で}}, {{ja-l|第}}, {{ja-l|次いで}}, {{ja-l|尋いで}}, {{ja-l|次第}}, {{ja-l|嗣}}

====Noun====
{{ja-noun|ついで}}

# [[order]], [[sequence]]
# [[follower]], [[successor]]; the [[next]] thing in a sequence
# a [[good]] [[opportunity]] to do something; doing something [[incidental]] to something else

=====Usage notes=====
The ''good opportunity'' sense is more often encountered as {{ja-r|序でに|ついで に}}.
